Question.Subject: what happened to codecall.net?
Question.Content:
just a little while ago i went to click the bookmark i have to take me to the codecall forums , but i got a screen saying "CLOSED BY SOQOR ARMY" as well as below that "Own3d By , HACKERS PAL & Jerusalem Hacker ~" witch makes me think that its not that they own the site but that they hacked and deleted it .
heres the link to the forum if any 1 else wants to see if they can figure out WTF happened http://forum.codecall.net/
Question.ChosenAnswer: Ya man it was totally hacked by some one but I'm sure James has a back up of the site if they did delete it. It will be back up soon.

Answer.Content: Ya man it was totally hacked by some one but I'm sure James has a back up of the site if they did delete it. It will be back up soon.
